Linear A sits firmly in the context of contemporary writing systems:  
ğ’‰º PA ğ  pa ğ˜‚ PA ğ€ pa ğ” PA Ï€ pi ğ²	B		( Mesopotamian, Aegeanâ€¦, Ugaritic, [Anatolian](Anatolian.html) [Elamite](Elamite.html) )
